references.paper_title: Self-labelling via simultaneous clustering and representation learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the self-labeling technique, which is a core component of the proposed OwMatch framework.

references.paper_title: Deep residual learning for image recognition
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the ResNet architecture, which is the backbone network used in the OwMatch experiments.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised learning of visual features by contrasting cluster assignments
references.reason: This work introduces contrastive learning, which is a key technique leveraged in OwMatch for improved performance.

references.paper_title: FixMatch: simplifying semi-supervised learning with consistency and confidence
references.reason: This influential paper introduces the FixMatch framework, which is a benchmark model for semi-supervised learning and is directly compared to OwMatch.
This paper introduces the open-world semi-supervised learning (OwSSL) problem, which OwMatch directly addresses and improves upon.
